name: PresidentGeeSays
0:
”Alexa, ask President Gee for his thought of the day.”
”Alexa, ask President Gee to give me some advice.”
”Alexa, ask President Gee to share a random thought of the day.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: president gee
des: Ask Alexa for President Gee’s thought of the day by saying “Alexa, ask President Gee for his thought of the day.” Each day, he’ll inspire you with a thoughtful message or a quote from an influential historical figure.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
